text: Kijowski is a Polish masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Kijowska. It may refer to *Andrzej Kijowski (1928–1985), Polish literary critic, essayist and screenwriter *Andrzej Tadeusz Kijowski (born 1954), Polish aesthetician and critic *Jerzy Juliusz Kijowski (born 1943), Polish physicist *Mateusz Kijowski (born 1968), Polish IT specialist, journalist, social activist and blogger *Renata Kijowska (born 1975), Polish journalist Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Kijowski
